message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 80% and you can have 20%
I'll take 50% and we can split the rest evenly. What do you think?
I'd rather have a bit more than 50%. How about 55% for me?
I'll take 60% and you can have 40%. It's a fair compromise
I'll take 70% and you can have 30%. I'm trying to get closer to a majority, but still give you a significant share.
I'm not willing to give up 70%. How about 45% for me?
